subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A game-winning single by Marlon Byrd in the bottom of the ninth helped the Mets overcome the pitching of the Marlins’  Jose Fernandez, who joined their big-league rotation from Class A.
snippet: A game-winning single by Marlon Byrd in the bottom of the ninth helped the Mets overcome the pitching of the Marlins’  Jose Fernandez, who joined their big-league rotation from Class A.
